ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَخُونُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَ وَتَخُونُوٓا۟ أَمَٰنَٰتِكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You who have iman! do not betray Allah and His Messenger, and do not knowingly betray your trusts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O you who believe, do not be faithless to God and His Apostle, nor violate your trusts knowingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Believers! Do not be unfaithful to Allah and the Messenger, nor be knowingly unfaithful to your trusts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Believers, do not be dishonest to God and the Messengers or knowingly abuse your trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O People who Believe! Do not betray Allah and His Noble Messenger, nor purposely defraud your trusts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O you who believe! Betray not Allah and His Messenger, nor betray knowingly your Amanat (things entrusted to you).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O you who believe! be not unfaithful to Allah and the Apostle, nor be unfaithful to your trusts while you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O believers, betray not God and the Messenger, and betray not your trusts and that wittingly;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O ye who believe! Betray not Allah and His messenger, nor knowingly betray your trusts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not betray God and His Messenger, and do not knowingly violate your trusts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Ye who believe! defraud not Allah and the apostle, nor defraud your trusts while ye know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O you who have faith! Do not betray Allah and the Apostle, and do not betray your trusts knowingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O ye that believe! betray not the trust of Allah and the Messenger, nor misappropriate knowingly things entrusted to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O you who believe! Betray not Allah and His Messenger, nor betray knowingly your Amanat (things entrusted to you, and all the duties which Allah has ordained for you).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Believers, do not betray Allah and the Messenger, nor knowingly betray your trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O you who believe! Do not betray God and the Messenger, nor betray your trusts, while you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O you who have believed, do not betray Allah and the Messenger or betray your trusts while you know [the consequence].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:27] The following was revealed regarding Abū Lubāba Marwān b. ‘Abd al-Mundhir: the Prophet (s) had dispatched him to the Banū Qurayza so that they would submit to his [the Prophet’s] authority. But they [Banū Qurayza] consulted with him [as to whether they should cede], and he pointed out to them that a slaughter would ensue — for members of his family and his property were among them: O you who believe, do not betray God and the Messenger, and, do not, betray your trusts, that which has been entrusted to you, in the way of religion or otherwise, while you are aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 ye who believe!) the address here is to Marwan and Abu Lubabah Ibn 'Abd al-Mundhir (Betray not Allah) in relation to Religion (and His messenger) by advising the Banu Qurayzah not to accept the judgement of Sa'd Ibn Mu'adh, (nor knowingly betray your trusts) nor betray the obligations of Allah which are your trusts.
